title: HOW TO FACTORY RESET FROM PC
content: The device it selftdoesnt work and im getting a new one from you guys, the new refurbrished device is supposed to arrive hom etoday or tomorrow and i need to send you the malfunctionning one in the next 21 days. I know i need it to be factory reset but how can i do that if the device just wont start. the screen is black and wont open.
